articles.description: Massachusetts-based biotech company Moderna on Thursday announced it expects $18.4 billion in product sales in 2021 for its COVID-19 vaccine.
articles.content:
Massachusetts-based biotech company Moderna on Thursday announced it expects $18.4 billion in product sales in 2021 for its COVID-19 vaccine.
“2020 was a historic year for Moderna,” Stéphane Bancel,… [+1634 chars]
